code: import{useEffect}from'react';const useSocketListener=function(socket,user,eventName,callback){let dependencies=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:[];useEffect(()=>{if(user!==null&&user!==void 0&&user.companyId&&socket&&typeof socket.on==='function'){const fullEventName="company-".concat(user.companyId,"-").concat(eventName);console.log("Registrando listener: ".concat(fullEventName));socket.on(fullEventName,callback);return()=>{if(socket&&typeof socket.off==='function'){console.log("Removendo listener: ".concat(fullEventName));socket.off(fullEventName,callback);}};}},[socket,user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.companyId,...dependencies]);};export default useSocketListener;
